author: Steve_OS
title: Official MLB 15 The Show Roster Update Details (10-5-15)
text: Official MLB 15 The Show Roster Update Details (10-5-15) 07:41 AM - October 5, 2015 by Steve_OS The official weekly MLB 15 The Show roster update is available now. The update adds 3 players and includes 62 player movements. Daddy Leagues have posted the attribute changes for the roster update, some of the changes include Josh Donaldson +1 (96), Paul Goldschmidt -1 (96), Jake Arrieta +4 (94), Manny Machado -1 (93), Jose Altuve +1 (93), Chris Sale -2 (92), Nolan Arenado +1 (91), Anthony Rizzo -1 (91), Michael Brantley +3 (89), Andrew Miller +3 (89), Dee Gordon +1 (88), Kris Bryant +3 (87), Jose Bautista +1 (86) and more. Check out all of the other details below.
